amendments.title: Food Safety and Standards (Labelling and Display) Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.summary: The amendment aims to revise the labelling and display requirements for food products, specifically regarding nutrition information and labeling.
requirements: Update to labeling requirements for certain food products
Inclusion of specific details on food labels
Display of nutrition information in a specific format
Update to labeling requirements for packaged foods
amendments.details: Companies must review and update their labeling and packaging to comply with the new regulations, ensuring that all required information is accurately displayed and easily accessible to consumers.

amendments.title: Food Safety and Standards (Packaging) First Amendment Regulations, 2025
amendments.summary: The amendment revises the packaging regulations for food products, focusing on the use of certain materials and compliance with safety standards.
requirements: Compliance with revised packaging material standards
Labeling of packaging materials with specific information
Adherence to safety standards for packaging
Update to packaging regulations for certain food products
Inclusion of specific details on packaging labels
Mandatory compliance with new packaging standards
amendments.details: Companies must assess their packaging materials and processes to ensure compliance with the revised regulations, making necessary changes to maintain safety and quality standards.

deadlines.raw: effective from the date of publication in the Gazette
